About In-N-Out Burger In-N-Out Burger is a Fast Food restaurant located at 6000 San Anselmo Rd in Atascadero, CA . In-N-Out Burger has been described as an Great Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 8 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No

March 27, 2009
Food
8

8

I eat here often. The food and service is excellent.. They know us there now and when we walk in the door they know what we want to drink without asking..

In-N-Out Burger Tips Order a bare meat pattie as a road snack for the dog! Or break it up and mix it with the kibble like I do! Only $0.75!
Andrew S. Best Fast Food Chain known to man. Try a Double-Double Cheeseburger, and don't forget the fries and milkshake! (Strawberry milkshake is the best ever)
